On 3/2/07, mohitkk <mohitkk@...> wrote:
> Hello, I am new to JUnit and facing various problems using it. I have
>  a GUI application which has around 40 modules. Can anybody tell me
>  what is the maximum limit on the no. of  interconnected modules on
>  which i can perfom unit test.

There is no technical limit for the number of interconnected modules
you can test with JUnit.

However, I must point out that if your test is exercising multiple
"modules" (whatever that means), it's probably not a unit test but an
integration test.

Lasse
